data.name: Evolution of the Industry through COVID
data.summary: COVID has pushed most organizations and tested their resilience and agility. The session will focus on multiple dimensions around the how customer expectations from various businesses will evolve and how that will impact the BPM industry. This track will also touch upon the BPM industryâ€™s reaction to the COVID crisis, strengths and weaknesses and help us understand the readiness of the industry as well as gaps to fill. The session will also focus on how India can contribute to and lead the transformation
